comment: He has a fully coherent self learning Algorithm that wonders around from device to device. It’s name is Singularity.

I'm always interested in who contribute to these subtitles, since there are a lot of obvious errors that every physics major student should be able to figure out... Such as Fock state vs flux state (WTF it is?) in the video around 44:00 and so.
At 1:01:24 the given inequality must be greater than one for the adiabatic case, not smaller than one.
Pretty sure these subs must be automatically generated
